articles.description:
Re @MinaProtocol One wallet will be used for teams but all all names in Name category.
There will be category input for each type of submission:
Dapp/Starter Kit/Tech Blog - If you only did one type, leave others blank.
Make sure you have your repos public, a solid ReadMe and licenses set MIT

https://twitter.com/developer_dao/status/1674753655642238976

Developer DAO (üß±, üöÄ):‚ÄÇWhat are the prerequisites for building zkApps on the @minaprotocol? ü§î

- A sense of adventure 
- How to use a CLI
- JavaScript or Typescript
- A UI Framework like React or Svelte
Check out our hackathon üëáüèª https://t.co/EYBg6WMjFQ

articles.description:
RT‚ÄÇnader dabit | nader.lens
I tried out @OpenAI functions today and ended up building and open sourcing what I'm calling the God app.
It uses @replicatehq + GPT4 to enable:
- Text to video
- Text to audio
- Text to image
- General language processing and text generation via GPT4
All from a single text‚Ä¶ https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1674564901203746818

RT‚ÄÇropats16 (üß±, üöÄ) ·µç·µê
Want to understand @ArweaveEco‚Äôs current mining mechanism?
Here‚Äôs a super simple explanation üëá https://twitter.com/CommunityLabs/status/1674138791647531008

Community Labs | we're hiring!:‚ÄÇ@ArweaveEco is a global network storing information.
However, the network participants (nodes/ miners) must first verify and reach a consensus on the information to be stored.
Sometimes referred to as a ‚Äúmining mechanism‚Äù, this thread dives into how this process works üëá
1/15 https://t.co/LVeJgMTiXr
